channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DOGE Isn’t Dead. Here’s What Its Operatives Are Doing Now
item.description: Contrary to popular reports, DOGE has “burrowed into the agencies like ticks,” government sources tell WIRED.

item.title: Your iPhone Already Has iPhone Fold Software, but Apple Won’t Let You Use It
item.description: Recent exploits show iPadOS windows running on an iPhone, hinting at the future of Apple hardware and software alike—while also possibly revealing its...

item.title: Paris-based AI voice startup Gradium nabs $70M seed
item.description: Gradium, a startup spawned out of French AI lab Kyutai (backed by French telecom billionaire Xavier Niel), launched out of stealth on Tuesday.

item.title: 20% Off Brooks Promo Code & Deals for December 2025
item.description: Enjoy 20% off your first order with a Brooks coupon code, plus top discounts and deals on our favorite Brooks running shoes.

item.title: Melinda French Gates on Secrets: ‘Live a Truthful Life, Then You Don’t Have Any’
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Big Interview podcast, the philanthropist offers her insights on billionaire donors, kids on phones, and the importance ...

item.title: Apple just named a new AI chief with Google and Microsoft expertise, as John Giannandrea steps down
item.description: His replacement is Amar Subramanya, a highly regarded Microsoft executive who spent 16 years at Google, most recently leading engineering for the Gemi...

item.title: What does it mean when Uncle Sam is one of your biggest shareholders? Chip startup xLight is about to find out
item.description: You can imagine how this is all going over in Silicon Valley, where the libertarian ethos runs deep.

item.title: Vitamix Promo Codes and Deals: $25 Off + Free Shipping
item.description: Score discounts on blenders, food processors, immersion blenders, and more with our selection of Vitamix coupons and deals.

item.title: One of Google’s biggest AI advantages is what it already knows about you
item.description: The promise is AI that's uniquely helpful because it knows you. But the risk is AI that feels more like surveillance than service.

item.title: Zillow drops climate risk scores after agents complained of lost sales
item.description: The move is a loss for homebuyers, who through Zillow had ready access to a property's climate risk scores from First Street.
